overview:
Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock!
In this game, you will be pitted against a computer player.
Winning a match wins you a point. First player to 5 points wins the game.
computers_info:
There are several computer players to choose from:
C-3PO, R2D2, Hal, and Daneel.

Each computer player has thier own strategy:
- C-3PO is unsure and picks at random.
- R2D2 seems stuck in a loop with one particular move.
- Hal is fixated on using an edged weapon.
- Daneel tries to guess your next move using some basic memory.
rules:
There are also two additional moves that you can choose from: Lizard and Spock.

The rules are as follows:
- Rock crushes Scissors and Lizard
- Paper covers Rock and disproves Spock
- Scissors cuts Paper and decapitates Lizard
- Lizard eats Paper and poisons Spock
- Spock vaporizes Rock and smashes Scissors.
conclusion:
Once the game is over, you will also be given the opportunity to see 
the game history.
Take the time to memorize these moves before moving on.
